marketplaces.name: hyusap
marketplaces.description: Personal plugin marketplace featuring nodcode and other experimental Claude Code plugins by Ayush Paul

files.README.md:
# Ayush's Plugins

Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace by Ayush Paul.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add hyusap/cc
```

## Plugins

### nodcode

Hands-free yes/no interactions using AirPods head gestures.

**Install:**
```bash
/plugin install nodcode@hyusap
```

**Setup:**
```bash
/nodcode:setup
```

[Documentation](https://github.com/hyusap/nodcode)

## License

MIT
